关机命令

```
shutdown -h now
halt
init 0
```

**shell基本操作**

```
cat /etc/shells
```

`tab` 键自动补齐

`\`键强制换行

```
man +命令
查看命令手册
/字符  就是查找
```

```
1. ls grep /usr/share/doc '4$'
2. grep '[0-9]' /etc/hosts
3. grep '127\.0\.0\.1' /etc/hosts
```
